snippet.title: New Super Mario Bros. Wii: The Prankster Comets - NFGD Trailer
snippet.description:
Please read the pinned comment.

Original description:
So, on NHD I've said that I wouldn't make any trailer until the game is at least 50% done, but I've seen that the NFGD still accepted submissions, so I made a trailer in the end.

The mod isn't released yet, but I'll try to release it before 2022.

The trailer actually made it in NFGD, here's the link: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PfKRN1Ejbho

My discord: Asu-chan#2929
Check for updates of the mod on NHD: https://discord.gg/nXgyHrMyjA
